TopicTitle: Electricity Spike/Drain when on Warp (Modded Install, 1.0.4)

Articles.Content:
All in the title lads; I play the game and when I goto high warp (x10,000-100,000) the electricity suddenly plummets, often resulting in a kick to normal speed and (if unlucky) a Kerbal dying from air toxicity. This is even with solar panels and battery sources on the craft.

My mod list is extensive, but I have Warp Unlocked (I think thats what it's called), Near Future Solar and TAC Life Support installed; I think they're the only ones which directly affect electricity/resource consumption.

Any ideas?

The work around I think (I'm afraid we've all have learned the hard way) is to have an extra battery pack on board which is disabled/disconnected, especially for these occasions.

When you come out of warp.. you 'connect' the backup battery and spend a few hours recharging your systems.
